author: By BRADY McCOMBS Associated Press
title: Police: Utah man threatened mayor over stay-at-home order
description: SALT LAKE CITY — A day before a large weekend rally in Salt Lake City othat drew hundreds of people to protest the city's stay-at-home order, a man was arrested who police say threatened a “civil war” if Mayor Erin…
content: SALT LAKE CITY A day before a large weekend rally in Salt Lake City othat drew hundreds of people to protest the city's stay-at-home order, a man was arrested who police say threatened a civil war if Mayor Erin Mendenhall did not open up the city," according … [+2206 chars]
